title: Replace all emojis with Lucide icons throughout the app
close_reason: Replaced all emojis in PortManagerPopup.tsx getProcessIcon with Lucide icons: Circle (node/python/go), Gem (ruby), Coffee (java), Cog (rust), Server (php), Globe (nginx), Database (postgres/mysql/mongo), HardDrive (redis), Container (docker), Zap (default)

title: Implement file system watcher for auto-refreshing sidebar directory view
close_reason: Implemented file system watcher using notify crate with 500ms debouncing. Frontend listens for fs-change events and auto-refreshes the file tree.

title: Create ColorsTab.tsx and add to SettingsPopup
Node Modules Cleaner - Clean up node_modules folders from Tools dropdown
close_reason: Implemented Node Modules Cleaner tool with scan and delete functionality
